  readyReplicas: number

  status: 'Available' | 'Progressing' | 'Degraded'
  createdAt: string
}

// ==================== Monitor Mock Data ====================
export const mockMetricsSummary = {
  clusterCount: 7,
  nodeCount: 54,
  podCount: 328,
  alertCount: 3,
}

// Generate 24 hours CPU usage data
export function generateTimeSeriesData\(baseValue: number, variance: number, points = 24\) {
  const now = new Date\(\)
  return Array.from\({ length: points }, \(_, i\) => {
    const time = new Date\(now.getTime\(\) - \(points - 1 - i\) * 3600 * 1000\)
    const hours = time.getHours\(\).toString\(\).padStart\(2, '0'\)
    const minutes = time.getMinutes\(\).toString\(\).padStart\(2, '0'\)
    return {
      time: `${hours}:${minutes}`,
      value: Math.max\(5, Math.min\(95, baseValue + \(Math.random\(\) - 0.5\) * variance * 2\)\).toFixed\(1\),
    }
  }\)
}

export const mockCpuData = generateTimeSeriesData\(45, 20\)
export const mockMemoryData = generateTimeSeriesData\(65, 15\)
